summary: AN ORDINANCE accepting electrical overhead and underground distribution easements over portions of Knox's Five Acre Garden Tracts; Caver's Addition; Eagle Heights Addition; J.F. Ord's Home Tracts; Richmond Highlands; the northeast quarter of Section 17, Township 23 North, Range 4 East; Brighton Beach; and vacated Ballinger Avenue, as described below and placing said easements under the jurisdiction of the City Light Department.
